title: Minimum Domino Rotations For Equal Row
content: In a row of dominoes, and represent the top and bottom halves of the domino. (A domino is a tile with two numbers from 1 to 6 - one on each half of the tile.) We may rotate the domino, so that and swap values. Return the minimum number of rotations so that all the values in are the same, or all the values in are the same. If it cannot be done, return .
